text: The Balochistan forest dormouse (Dryomys niethammeri) is a species of rodent in the Gliridae family. It is endemic to Pakistan. ==References== * Gippoliti S. 2002. Dryomys niethammeri . 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 29 July 2007. *Holden M.E. 2005. Family Gliridae, 819-841 in Mammal species of the world: a taxonomic and geographic reference. D E. Wilson and D.M. Reeder eds. Johns Hopkins University Press, Baltimore. Category:Mammals of Pakistan Category:Dormice
title: Balochistan forest dormouse
